issue.title: [Java] Add Date/Time Support to JSON File
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-582](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-582). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Need to add Date/Time support to JsonFileReader/Writer for the purpose of integration testing.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-582?focusedCommentId=15902241) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I'm working on this, should be ready soon.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-582?focusedCommentId=15958939) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 495
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/495>
